entry.content:
What influenced and inpsired you to learn to code?

Since the begining I had a passion for “messing” around with computer. I
never thought I would go into web development, but then when I finished my
pre med from Brooklyn College and got my degree in Health and Nutrition, I
was looking at where I want to be in future and I realized it wasn’t in
HEALTH profession. So then I started looking around and I realized I want
to go into computer development, so then I looked aroung and I applied to
all the Bootcamps. I got into most of them and honestly didnt finsh the
process for some. So when it all went down, I was left with two option,
that I wanted to go to, devboot camp or Fullstack Academy. After looking
at all the statistics and paths around Javascript vs Ruby, I decided to go

date: 2014-10-10 13:20:00

tags: first post
